Welcome to AdWork. Earn Money by rating true or false to facts from around the world.
There are no wrong or right answers. Rate and get Paid!
All payments are done every 10th of the following Month
Payments are done online through Paypal. Ensure you have a working Paypal account to receive payments
The more you rate, the more you get to earn and learn
Enjoy! Have fun making your dreams come true

More details (optional)

Welcome to AdWork

Here you can earn money by watching & rating videos.

The more you rate, the more you earn.
Every video you watch & rate earns you points in AdWork\n\nThe points you earn can be redeemed for real money.

You must have at least 200 points to make a withdrawal request

All withdrawals are paid via PayPal every 10th of the following month

Start watching and start earning today

Terms & Conditions apply.
got it

At AdWork, we value our customers 24/7

We aim to make your experience with AdWork smooth, fruitful and seamless

Thank you for choosing us to help you make money online daily

If you ever run into any problems, feel free to contact us at adwork254@gmail.com

and we will get back to you within 24hrs





© AdWork 2022

While you use the AdWork App, we collect some data to help make your experience seamless

Some of the data we collect are; but not limited to:

- Username
- Email Address
- Points earned
- Estimated money made
&
- Current date

Please note:
We DO NOT sell your data to any third party company

All data collected is secured using end to end encryption

We may occasionally send you emails about updates & news we may have

If for any reason you would like to have your data deleted from our servers, do not hesitate to reach out to us





© AdWork 2022

Every time you rate a fact & watch an ad, you earn money

The more facts you rate & ads you watch, the more you get to earn

How much money a fact or ad is worth is calculated automatically & an estimate is given for reference

The estimated earning are subjected to review, taxes and commissions at the end of each month

The highest earner of the month gets a BONUS reward each and every month

So what are you waiting for? Start earning online today with AdWork !

Please note:
Skipping an ad after rating a fact may lead to less earnings

So make sure you watch ads as much as you can





© AdWork 2022

AdWork requires you to have a minimum of $20 points to make a withdrawal request

All payments are made through PayPal so please have an active PayPal account

After earning enough money, you can make a withdrawal request from your profile page at any time of the month

Please note:
Payments are made every 10th of the following month after a withdrawal request is made

You can make as many withdrawal requests as possible during the month and get a large payout at the end

The opportunities are endless with AdWork !





© AdWork 2022

Congratulations!

Your withdrawal request has been sent successfully

We will get back to you after reviewing your request and deductions having been made

Please note:
The money value indicated on the app is an estimate and the actual value may vary after your request is reviewed
Swipe left & right to see more tabs
In AdWork, Transparent is how we deliver to you and Honest in what we say to you, every day, everywhere.
Get all the information you need about the data we collect, how you use the app and how much money you have earned from using the app
You may lose funds by not having an active internet connection while using the app
